meanings.definition: To punch harder or more effectively than someone else.
meanings.sent1: In the boxing match, the champion outpunches his opponent with powerful blows.
meanings.sent2: She always outpunches her training partner during sparring sessions.
meanings.sent3: The superhero outpunches the villain, saving the day with mighty fists.
meanings.sent4: His determination outpunches any obstacle in his path, leading to success.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm outpunches the sun, darkening the sky with heavy rain.

meanings.definition: To exceed in punching power or effectiveness.
meanings.sent1: The new punching bag outpunches the old one, providing a better workout.
meanings.sent2: His technique outpunches his opponent, giving him the upper hand in the fight.
meanings.sent3: The robot outpunches its previous version, showcasing advanced technology.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outpunches her fear, allowing her to face challenges bravely.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall outpunches the stream, creating a magnificent display of power.
